title: Strengthening System Design Competencies: Schema-Based Translation Education and Cognitive Load Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational translation skills and understanding of domain-specific (medical/legal/technical) terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply schema activation strategies with 80% accuracy through a pre-translation planning phase.
Learners can translate complex texts by decomposing them step-by-step using a goal-free problem-solving approach.
Learners reduce translation process errors by 50% or more using a self-checklist leveraging metacognition.
Learners complete at least five translation samples reflecting domain-specific terminology and cultural contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
